price: Na hiyo ni Pepo mliyo rithishwa kwa hayo mliyo kuwa mkiyafanya.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Na kutimiza neema, wataambiwa: Hii ndiyo Pepo mliyo ipata kwa sababu ya vitendo vyema mlivyo vitanguliza mlipo kuwa duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
